languages.text: "Исполнять волю владыки — наш долг. Мы более не проводим души на другую сторону. Когда время настанет, Неумирающий заберет их сам".
"Our duty is to do our {mf|lord|lady}'s bidding. We no longer usher souls to the other side. The Undying One will collect them Himself when their time comes."
languages.original_text: "Исполнять волю владыки — наш долг. Мы более не проводим души на другую сторону. Когда время настанет, Неумирающий заберет их сам".

traits.locale_text: "Our duty is to do our {mf|lord|lady}'s bidding. We no longer usher souls to the other side. The Undying One will collect them Himself when their time comes."
"Our duty is to do our {mf|lord|lady}'s bidding. We no longer usher souls to the other side. The Undying One will collect them Himself when their time comes."
"Our duty is to do our {mf|lord|lady}'s bidding. We no longer usher souls to the other side. The Undying One will collect them Himself when their time comes."

"Our duty is to do our {mf|lord|lady}'s bidding. We no longer usher souls to the other side. The Undying One will collect them Himself when their time comes."

languages.text: "Unsere Pflicht lautet, die Befehle {mf|unseres Lords|unserer Lady} auszuführen. Wir begleiten keine Seelen mehr auf die andere Seite. Der Todlose sammelt sie selbst, wenn ihre Zeit gekommen ist."
languages.original_text: "Our duty is to do our {mf|lord|lady}'s bidding. We no longer usher souls to the other side. The Undying One will collect them Himself when their time comes."

traits.locale_text: "Unsere Pflicht lautet, die Befehle {mf|unseres Lords|unserer Lady} auszuführen. Wir begleiten keine Seelen mehr auf die andere Seite. Der Todlose sammelt sie selbst, wenn ihre Zeit gekommen ist."

languages.text: «Nuestro deber es cumplir las órdenes de nuestr{mf|o|a} señor{mf||a}. Ya no enviamos almas al otro lado. El Inmortal las recogerá Él mismo cuando llegue su momento».
languages.original_text: "Our duty is to do our {mf|lord|lady}'s bidding. We no longer usher souls to the other side. The Undying One will collect them Himself when their time comes."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestro deber es cumplir las órdenes de nuestr{mf|o|a} señor{mf||a}. Ya no enviamos almas al otro lado. El Inmortal las recogerá Él mismo cuando llegue su momento».

languages.text: 「私たちの務めは、主人の命令を実行することなのです。私たちが魂をあちら側に導くことは、もはやありません。時が来れば、不死の者が自ら魂を集められるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Our duty is to do our {mf|lord|lady}'s bidding. We no longer usher souls to the other side. The Undying One will collect them Himself when their time comes."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちの務めは、主人の命令を実行することなのです。私たちが魂をあちら側に導くことは、もはやありません。時が来れば、不死の者が自ら魂を集められるでしょう」

languages.text: “我们的职责便是服从主人的命令，我们不需要再将灵魂带到彼岸了。当那些人的大限到来之际，不死之神会亲自带走他们的灵魂。”
languages.original_text: "Our duty is to do our {mf|lord|lady}'s bidding. We no longer usher souls to the other side. The Undying One will collect them Himself when their time comes."

traits.locale_text: “我们的职责便是服从主人的命令，我们不需要再将灵魂带到彼岸了。当那些人的大限到来之际，不死之神会亲自带走他们的灵魂。”

languages.text: « Nous avons le devoir d'accomplir la volonté de notre {mf|seigneur|maîtresse}. Nous n'expédions plus les âmes de l'autre côté. L'Immortel viendra les chercher Lui-même en temps voulu. »
languages.original_text: "Our duty is to do our {mf|lord|lady}'s bidding. We no longer usher souls to the other side. The Undying One will collect them Himself when their time comes."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons le devoir d'accomplir la volonté de notre {mf|seigneur|maîtresse}. Nous n'expédions plus les âmes de l'autre côté. L'Immortel viendra les chercher Lui-même en temps voulu. »

languages.text: "Vazifemiz, {mf|lordumuzun|leydimizin} buyruklarını yerine getirmektir. Artık ruhları öteki tarafa taşımıyoruz. Ölmeyen, vakitleri geldiğinde onları bizzat toplayacaktır."
languages.original_text: "Our duty is to do our {mf|lord|lady}'s bidding. We no longer usher souls to the other side. The Undying One will collect them Himself when their time comes."
